author: Pamela Muse
text:
LA County looking for information re: Resource Sharing Agreements that is being required under the Workforce Investment Act (WIA).  They want to know what other WIB’s nationwide are doing to address:
1)       In the area of Resource Sharing Agreements that is being required under the Workforce Investment Act (WIA), we wanted to know what other WIB’s nationwide are doing to address this requirement and provide any samples that have been accepted by the Department of Labor;
2)      In the area of youth testing under WIA, are there any best practices or testing tools that can objectively assess the academic level, skill level, and service needs of a participant. 
3)      In the area of dislocated worker recruitment and marketing, we would like to know if there are any best practices in the recruitment of employers for on the job training and customized training.  
Your immediate response would be very helpful!
Pam
